creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Snivy Slithers onto the Scene for Pokémon GO’s Community Day on April 11
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Catch a load of Snivy, earn extra Stardust, and get a Serperior that knows Frenzy Plant.
contentSnippet: Catch a load of Snivy, earn extra Stardust, and get a Serperior that knows Frenzy Plant.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Pokémon TCG Superstars Share Their Favorite Sun & Moon-Era Cards
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Revisit some of the top cards from the Sun & Moon Series with stellar members of the Pokémon TCG community.
contentSnippet: Revisit some of the top cards from the Sun & Moon Series with stellar members of the Pokémon TCG community.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: The Pokémon Players Cup IV Qualifier Online Competition Has Begun
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Compete in Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield now through April 11 to earn an invitation to the Pokémon Players Cup IV Region Qualifiers.
contentSnippet: Compete in Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield now through April 11 to earn an invitation to the Pokémon Players Cup IV Region Qualifiers.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Watch Ash Take on the Alola Island Challenge in Pokémon the Series on Pokémon TV
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Ash battles Island Kahunas and Totem Pokémon across all four main islands of Alola in themed episodes on Pokémon TV.
contentSnippet: Ash battles Island Kahunas and Totem Pokémon across all four main islands of Alola in themed episodes on Pokémon TV.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Rivals’ Week Introduces Therian Forme Landorus, Skrelp, and Clauncher to Pokémon GO
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Channel your competitive side from April 13 to April 18 with an event featuring Pokémon known to be rivals.
contentSnippet: Channel your competitive side from April 13 to April 18 with an event featuring Pokémon known to be rivals.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Organizer Application Pause
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Pokémon Professor and Organizer applications are temporarily on hold.
contentSnippet: Pokémon Professor and Organizer applications are temporarily on hold.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: A Picture-Perfect New Pokémon Snap Celebration in Pokémon GO
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: From April 29 to May 2, celebrate New Pokémon Snap with themed research, avatar items, featured Pokémon appearing in the wild, and more.
contentSnippet: From April 29 to May 2, celebrate New Pokémon Snap with themed research, avatar items, featured Pokémon appearing in the wild, and more.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Scout Selene & Rowlet and Elio & Popplio in Pokémon Masters EX
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Additional sync pairs from the Alola region arrive just in time to take part in the Trials on the Isle event.
contentSnippet: Additional sync pairs from the Alola region arrive just in time to take part in the Trials on the Isle event.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Celebrate 25 Years of Pokémon With Memorable Moments from the Alola Region
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Look back at the incredible people, places, and Pokémon that make up the world of Pokémon Sun, Pokémon Moon, Pokémon Ultra Sun, and Pokémon Ultra Moon.
contentSnippet: Look back at the incredible people, places, and Pokémon that make up the world of Pokémon Sun, Pokémon Moon, Pokémon Ultra Sun, and Pokémon Ultra Moon.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Pokémon TCG Triple Play: Three Experts Take On Orbeetle
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Robin Schulz, Ross Cawthon, and Xander Pero assemble three unique decks with the powerful Orbeetle at their center.
contentSnippet: Robin Schulz, Ross Cawthon, and Xander Pero assemble three unique decks with the powerful Orbeetle at their center.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Learn to Build Pokémon TCG Decks
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Get tips on how to construct winning Pokémon TCG decks from a variety of starting points.
contentSnippet: Get tips on how to construct winning Pokémon TCG decks from a variety of starting points.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: 2022 Pokémon TCG Championship Series Season Format Rotation
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Find out which cards will be permitted in the 2022 Pokémon TCG Championship Series season.
contentSnippet: Find out which cards will be permitted in the 2022 Pokémon TCG Championship Series season.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Battle Tornadus and Scout N & Zekrom in Pokémon Masters EX
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Take on a tempestuous challenge in the Legendary Arena, and hatch some new partners in a Water- and Electric-Type Egg Event.
contentSnippet: Take on a tempestuous challenge in the Legendary Arena, and hatch some new partners in a Water- and Electric-Type Egg Event.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Take a Different Kind of Alola Island Challenge with the Alola Region Quiz
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Test your knowledge of the tropical Alola region and the Pokémon and people that inhabit it in the video games, animation, and Pokémon TCG.
contentSnippet: Test your knowledge of the tropical Alola region and the Pokémon and people that inhabit it in the video games, animation, and Pokémon TCG.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Watch Misty’s Memorable Moments in Pokémon the Series on Pokémon TV
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: The Cerulean Gym Leader shows her competitive side and love for Water-type Pokémon.
contentSnippet: The Cerulean Gym Leader shows her competitive side and love for Water-type Pokémon.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Celebrate World Penguin Day with Max Raid Battles Featuring Eiscue
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Through April 25, the Penguin Pokémon Eiscue will be appearing more frequently in Max Raid Battles.
contentSnippet: Through April 25, the Penguin Pokémon Eiscue will be appearing more frequently in Max Raid Battles.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Get Ready for Pokémon GO Fest 2021 on July 17 and 18
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: Mark your calendars for two days of catching and researching Pokémon during this global event!
contentSnippet: Mark your calendars for two days of catching and researching Pokémon during this global event!

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Scout Raihan & Duraludon and Tackle Pokémon Masters EX’s New Time Trial Event
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: The Galar region sync pair can help players earn useful items by completing battles quickly in the Eternal Rivals time trial event.
contentSnippet: The Galar region sync pair can help players earn useful items by completing battles quickly in the Eternal Rivals time trial event.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Battle Your Way to the Top in the GO Battle League

content: Get tips and tricks for making the most of your Fast and Charged Attacks in Pokémon GO.
contentSnippet: Get tips and tricks for making the most of your Fast and Charged Attacks in Pokémon GO.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Victini VMAX Keeps the Fires of Victory Burning

contentSnippet: Two-time International Champion Stéphane Ivanoff walks us through a sizzling deck built around a standout card from Sword & Shield—Battle Styles.

creator: The Pokémon Company

content: Watch your favorite Pokémon photographers shoot their way to success for a limited time.
contentSnippet: Watch your favorite Pokémon photographers shoot their way to success for a limited time.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Face Various Meowth, Including Shiny Galarian Meowth, in Max Raid Battles

contentSnippet: You can encounter Meowth, Alolan Meowth, Galarian Meowth, and Gigantamax Meowth in Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Pokémon: Diamond and Pearl Episodes Added to Pokémon TV

content: Journey with Ash and Pikachu as they make new friends and face new challenges in the Sinnoh region.
contentSnippet: Journey with Ash and Pikachu as they make new friends and face new challenges in the Sinnoh region.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Compete In the Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield Ranked Battles May 2021 Season

contentSnippet: Earn in-game rewards by pitting your most powerful Pokémon against players from around the world.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Top Tips for Your New Pokémon Snap Adventure
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: It takes a lot of skill to become a master Pokémon photographer, and this guide will help get you started.
contentSnippet: It takes a lot of skill to become a master Pokémon photographer, and this guide will help get you started.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Confront Ghetsis & Kyurem in Pokémon Masters EX’s New Legendary Event

contentSnippet: The true leader of Team Plasma has come to confront N, and you can once again scout Alder & Volcarona.

creator: The Pokémon Company
title: Luminous Legends X Introduces Xerneas to Pokémon GO
dc:creator: The Pokémon Company
content: From May 4 to 17, catch Pokémon like Spritzee, Swirlix, and Goomy, complete themed research, and try out a new type of Lure Module.
contentSnippet: From May 4 to 17, catch Pokémon like Spritzee, Swirlix, and Goomy, complete themed research, and try out a new type of Lure Module.
